rooms.name: Entrance Hallway
rooms.description: A North-facing entrance with a welcoming vestibule leading into the studio apartment. The design incorporates traditional Indian elements and modern Bohemian touches.

rooms.name: Living and Dining Area
rooms.description: An open-plan living area with floor-to-ceiling windows that allow ample natural light. Bohemian decor with local artisanal touches creates a relaxed atmosphere.

rooms.name: Kitchenette
rooms.description: A compact yet functional kitchen with modern amenities and a local design aesthetic. Integration of traditional Indian cooking area with contemporary appliances.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: A small, efficient bathroom designed with local materials and Bohemian accessories. Functional fixtures and ample storage.

rooms.name: Garage
rooms.description: A two-car garage integrated into the ground floor design, providing easy access from the entrance. The layout supports both vehicle storage and occasional outdoor relaxation.

openings.location: North wall of Living Area and Entrance Hallway
openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling windows to maximize natural light, ensuring a bright and airy interior.
A centrally located door adhering to local building norms with Vastu principles emphasizing the auspicious north direction.
Access point for the two-car garage, designed for easy access while maintaining aesthetic integrity.
